tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE adverse_events (
   event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   event_date DATE,
   event_description TEXT,
   patient_id UUID,
   drug_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE drug_safety_info (
    drug_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_name VARCHAR(100),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
    safety_rating INT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE adverse_events (
  event_id UUID,
  event_date TIMESTAMP,
  patient_id UUID,
  event_description TEXT,
  PRIMARY KEY (event_id)
)

CREATE TABLE drug_safety_information (
  safety_id UUID,
  drug_name VARCHAR,
  side_effect TEXT,
  safety_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (safety_id)
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_reports (
  report_id UUID,
  report_date TIMESTAMP,
  report_description TEXT,
  regulatory_agency VARCHAR,
  PRIMARY KEY (report_id)
)

CREATE TABLE drug_classification (
  classification_id UUID,
  drug_name VARCHAR,
  classification VARCHAR,
  PRIMARY KEY (classification_id)
)

CREATE TABLE adverse_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_date DATE,
    event_description TEXT,
    patient_id INT,
    drug_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE drug_safety_info (
    drug_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_name VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    approval_date DATE,
    side_effects TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_reporting (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    event_id INT,
    reporting_agency VARCHAR(50),
    report_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender CHAR(1),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE drug_approval_status (
    drug_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    approval_status VARCHAR(20),
    last_approval_date DATE,
    next_approval_date DATE,
    remarks TEXT
);
